question.body: Would you say that the least squares regression line fits the data well?

alternative.title: R
alternative.p: The least squares regression line is IQ = 90.8 + 1.54(cry count), and this graph displays it on the scatterplot.

While the line captures the general linear trend of the data, it does not fit the data very well due to the moderately weak linearity in the data. Visually, we see that the data points do not lay close to the line, resulting in a relatively poor fit of the line to the data.
